org.apache.flex.abc.semantics

Class Trait

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.abc.semantics.Trait

  • public class Trait
extends Object
    A representation of an individual trait.

      • addAttr

        public void addAttr(String key,
           Object value)
        Add a trait attribute.
        Parameters:
        key - - the attribute's name.
        value - - the attribute's value. 
         the attribute must not be present.

      • getKind

        public byte getKind()
        Returns:
        the low nibble of the kind byte (the actual trait kind).

      • getFullKindByte

        public byte getFullKindByte()
        Returns:
        the kind byte with its flags set in the high nibble.

        Returns:
        the Trait's name.

        Determine whether an attribute is present.

        Returns:
